fields.title: Lesson #53. Homework
fields.description:
Add a field for a detailed description to the task model - a text field (TextField), may be empty.

Create a migration and apply it.

Fill in the new field in the existing tasks with some descriptions and update the fixture.

fields.title: Lesson #52. Homework
fields.description:
the task id for this page should be passed as part of the path, not in the query string.

There is no need to display a detailed description on the main page.

Add links to go from the tasks on the main page to the detailed view page.

fields.title: Lesson #51. Homework
fields.description:
Set names for all urls and replace all links on the site with the generation using the reverse function and the {%url%} tag. 

To redirect from forms, use the redirect function.

Add a basic template and a navigation bar.
